attributes.action: Save the Southend on sea Club 50, The Pensioners Club
attributes.additional_details: 200 members of Club 50 are about to loose their premises due to local government cutbacks. This club is a lifeline to many elderly people who are able to participate in many  activities. Not only does it give them the company that some would otherwise miss dearly it also keeps them fit  alert and happy. A good recipe for keeping our senior citizens well, and away from the hospitals
